com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup

Class FileCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup.CleanupTask<com.fasterxml.storemate.store.file.FileCleanupStats>
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup.FileCleaner

  • public class FileCleaner
extends CleanupTask<com.fasterxml.storemate.store.file.FileCleanupStats>
    CleanupTask responsible for managing file system structure by pruning empty directories and, if necessary, deleting ancient files that have slipped through basic TTL expiration mechanism.

    • Field Summary

      protected long _maxTimeToLiveMsecs

    • Field Detail

      • _fileManager

        protected com.fasterxml.storemate.store.file.FileManager _fileManager

      • _maxTimeToLiveMsecs

        protected long _maxTimeToLiveMsecs
        Age used for checking if a directory is safe to completely nuke, due to its contents necessarily being older than their maximum lifetime. This is actually 1 day higher than configured value, to allow for things like clock skew, wrongly configured timezones and alike.
